text: Marcelo Elío Chavez (15 May 1966 - 27 July 2020) was a Bolivian politician and journalist. He was born in Oruro, Bolivia. He was a member of the Movement for Socialism. He was President of the Plurinational Legislative Assembly from 2014 to 2015. Elío Chávez died in Oruro on 27 July 2020, aged 54.Fallece Marcelo Elío Chávez, expresidente de la Cámara de Diputados ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Bolivian journalists Category:Bolivian politicians
title: Marcelo Elío Chávez
